last_episode_to_air.name: No More Secrets
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the Purple Lotus drains all magic, revealing the existence of the magical world to humans, Kyra and the Bureau risk everything to destroy the Lotus and prevent the end of elves and fairies.

name: The Bureau of Magical Things
overview: When ordinary teenager Kyra touches a mysterious book, she is transformed into a Tri-ling-–part-human, part-fairy and part-elf. In addition to acquiring amazing magical powers, Kyra discovers a secret world of magic all around her.

episodes.name: Magical Mishap
episodes.overview: When ordinary teenage Kyra is caught in a magical tug of war between Imogen, a mischievous elf, and Lily, a conscientious fairy, she discovers an extraordinary world of magic that exists in secret all around and her life changes forever.

episodes.name: Magic in the Air
episodes.overview: Unable to control her magic, Kyra joins Maxwell’s school. Kyra feels like an outsider, but when the class is assigned to solve a magical problem, Kyra’s intervention saves the day.

episodes.name: All the World's a Stage
episodes.overview: When Kyra's friend, Peter, witnesses Kyra doing magic, Lily tries to wipe his mind; the spell goes wrong, which results in Peter believing he's Shakespeare's Romeo in a play he's rehearsing for school and falling in love with Lily.

episodes.name: Gone to the Dogs
episodes.overview: Lily and Imogen's class assignment to protect an enchanted mailbox goes wrong and a postman is transformed into a dog; Kyra must use her magical ability to talk to dogs to find the missing pooch before the change becomes permanent.

episodes.name: A Knight to Remember
episodes.overview: A dangerous suit of armor escapes from the Museum of Magic; despite Imogen's reservations, Kyra attempts to stop the armor's rampage.

episodes.name: The  Test
episodes.overview: While under the scrutiny of crack DMI Agent Orla, Kyra and her class members are tested on their ability to handle magical outbreaks; when Orla releases a magical force that endangers Peter, Kyra must choose between the two worlds she now inhabits.

episodes.name: Fairy for a Day
episodes.overview: Kyra is confused about her place in the magical world, so Lily transforms her into a fairy; tiny Kyra gets trapped in a girl's bedroom.

episodes.name: Shortcut
episodes.overview: Kyra finds it difficult maintaining her double life; when the struggle begins to affect her basketball skills, Lily and Imogen use magic to help Kyra win.

episodes.name: On the Beach
episodes.overview: Concerned by Peter's growing suspicion of magical events, Kyra and Darra investigate a mysterious house and are transported to a magical beach with no way back; Kyra experiences a strange new power, which may be their only way out.

episodes.name: Uncharted Waters
episodes.overview: After seeing suspicious CCTV footage, Peter follows Darra to Maxwell's Bookshop where he films Kyra disappearing through a wall; Maxwell and Sean realize that Kyra's new power can only have come from the fabled orb.

episodes.name: A Fairy Tale
episodes.overview: Peter forces Kyra to explain about magic, but then gets trapped in a magical storybook; Kyra releases objects from the library to divert Imogen and Darra while Ruksy helps Peter, but when Ruksy has to erase Peter's memory, she can't.

episodes.name: Aisle 13
episodes.overview: A brush against a magical book re-ignites Kyra’s new magic – the unpredictable power transforms Maxwell into a guinea pig. Mathilda becomes suspicious about Kyra’s unusual friends.

episodes.name: Forces of Attraction
episodes.overview: Ruksy, Imogen and Lily venture into the dangerous Restricted Section of the Library in search of the truth about Kyra’snew magical powers.

episodes.name: The Eye Of Horus
episodes.overview: Kyra and Ruksy confront Maxwell about Kyra’s extraordinary power and the Professor opens up about his past as a DMI agent.

episodes.name: Judgement Day
episodes.overview: Kyra’s joke on Sean back fires, whilst Peter and Rusky tackle a magical problem that has escaped from the library.

episodes.name: Prize Day
episodes.overview: When the DMI student awards fall on the day Kyra’s step-dad wants to take her camping, Kyra hopes she can attend and still make it home in time. Will she be able to make it?

episodes.name: Accused
episodes.overview: When Kyra learns that her Orb magic can be removed but she will lose all memory of magic, she gets Peter to make a film to remind her; before Kyra's magic can be removed, the Orb is stolen and Imogen appears to be the culprit.

episodes.name: On the Case
episodes.overview: Imogen hides out in Kyra's room while she, Kyra, Peter and Ruksy try to discover who stole the Orb; when Kyra senses the Orb is in use, she jumps to the library and finds Orla manipulating Darra and Lily to steal the Orb magic.

episodes.name: End of the Road: Part 1
episodes.overview: Without magic or memory of the magical world, Kyra is unaware that Orla has taken over the DMI, intending to reveal magic to the humans.

episodes.name: End of the Road: Part 2
episodes.overview: As Maxwell and the class try to reclaim the Orb, Kyra's memory and magic return; Orla releases a dangerous artifact into River City.

episodes.name: Vanished
episodes.overview: When Kyra is magically snatched from Lily's sleepover and transported to a Bangkok warehouse, she and Darra are chased by a mysterious fairy and elf who accuse them of theft.

episodes.name: A Dangerous Secret
episodes.overview: Kyra forces Darra to explain why he was in the Bangkok warehouse, and they agree to join forces to find the Three Keys to the legendary, mythical Temple of the Purple Lotus.

episodes.name: Fortuna's Compact
episodes.overview: Tayla loses a magical compact that grants wishes, Mathilda finds it., which threatens the magical secret. Lily gets a crush on Ben, the new singer at the cafe.

episodes.name: The Big Sneeze
episodes.overview: Kyra catches a magical virus and her sneezing jumps Mathilda into the Library. Imogen warns Tayla about her reckless use of magic.

episodes.name: Welcome To The Jungle
episodes.overview: In search of the Second Key, Kyra and Darra jump to Thailand where their courage is tested by dangerous, magical obstacles. Imogen discovers why Tayla has no love for the magical world.

episodes.name: Mirror Image
episodes.overview: Professor Maxwell allows Tayla into the magic school for a day, but Tayla cracks a magical mirror and creates a malevolent doppelganger who threatens the Bureau.

episodes.name: Testing Times
episodes.overview: Fed up with being the only one in the bureau without magic, Peter sneakily acquires some, which creates chaos at his school and brings an end to Peter and Ruksy's relationship.

episodes.name: Almost Famous
episodes.overview: To help Ben's career, Lily casts a spell over a music video that Peter has filmed, causing everyone who sees the clip to sing and dance.

episodes.name: The Key to the Past
episodes.overview: In search of the Third Key, Darra and Kyra travel back in time where they are taken prisoner by Magnus Sorenson, a Tri-ling who is also seeking the Temple of the Purple Lotus.

episodes.name: The Message
episodes.overview: When Kyra and the Bureau go to Vietnam to find the Third Key, they bring to life a giant cobra statue that chases them back to the Library, resulting in Kyra getting a vision of the Purple Lotus.

episodes.name: The Enchanted Wood
episodes.overview: Maxwell is suspended from teaching, and Apinya, a magical archaeologist, takes over the school. To fix Ladder, Lily, Ruksy, Peter and Imogen venture into the fairy tale book to secure enchanted wood.

episodes.name: Liar, Liar
episodes.overview: While Lily and Ben are on their first date, Kyra and the Bureau attempt to capture a magical bug whose bite causes the victim to tell the truth. Peter and Ruksy get back together.

episodes.name: Let The Games Begin
episodes.overview: On Magic School Sports Day, the rivalry between Maxwell's School and the Crowther School is thrown into chaos when Kyra becomes the unwitting centre of a magical disruption.

episodes.name: New Tricks
episodes.overview: Maxwell and Kyra turn to Apinya for help to understand Kyras's connection to the Keys. To improve her chances of selection for the Magical Intervention, Imogen attempts to acquire a fairy ability.

episodes.name: Party Time
episodes.overview: Lily insists on helping Mathilda with Kyra's surprise birthday party, causing chaos; a magical object forces Kyra to use Orb Magic, which gives her a vision with the whereabouts of the Third Key.

episodes.name: Revelations
episodes.overview: Imogen becomes suspicious that Apinya is not who she claims to be; while trying to get her stepfather to accept Darra as her boyfriend, Kyra makes an extraordinary discovery about her birth father.

episodes.name: The Heist
episodes.overview: Maxwell and the two keys are kidnapped. Kyra retrieves the Third Key from the Bangkok warehouse, but it jumps her to the Temple of the Purple Lotus where her Orb Magic is drained.

episodes.name: Beginning of the End
episodes.overview: As the Purple Lotus begins to disrupt fairy and elf magic everywhere, Kyra makes an astonishing discovery about her Tri-ling heritage.

episodes.name: A Desperate Plan
episodes.overview: Kyra's attempt to get Orb Magic back from the Purple Lotus fails, so she and the Bureau travel back in time and stick to the original plan to prevent the Lotus from draining all magic.

episodes.name: No More Secrets
episodes.overview: As the Purple Lotus drains all magic, revealing the existence of the magical world to humans, Kyra and the Bureau risk everything to destroy the Lotus and prevent the end of elves and fairies.
